lenders.name: Jennifer Fair
lenders.occupational_info:
I'm an M.A. graduate student looking to advance my interests in freelance work such as writing and research and productive ventures thru my strong educational background and experience abroad.

Through Kiva, I'm seeking to make constructive contacts to help promote my interests and acquire patronage and loan funding in order to help advance my potential and complete the task I began and remained committed to thru many recent personal difficulties.

I've mainly been hindered by finances and lack of patronage and support. I now face the difficulty of reaching a maximum point to which I can obtain further government educational aid, and so must complete the last 2 terms self-financed.

I ask what help I can to reach a goal of $8,000 - 10,000 and would value any patronage and assistance in achieving this.

lenders.name: TopRank
lenders.occupational_info: TopRankMarketing.com is a digital marketing and public relations agency founded in 2001 and based in Minneapolis, MN. TopRank specializes in helping Fortune 1000 companies succeed on the social web through consulting, implementation and training services. Companies ranging from McKesson to Northwest Airlines trust TopRank to provide smart and profitable strategies and tactics for successful online marketing programs.

lenders.name: Rev. Leeland
lenders.occupational_info: For the past years I have been working in rural Liberia helping the people of rural Liberia to grow cassava for flour production. Bong County in central Liberia have the soil for growing cassava in Liberia. As you made know, Cassava is grown in many tropical countries of the world such as Africa, Asia and Latin America. The principal markets for cassava products are in Europe - the European Economic Community being the most important for dried roots - and for cassava starch the United States, the United Kingdom and Japan. Although complete statistics of world trade in cassava products are not available, thus making it difficult to estimate the total quantity entering international trade, the import statistics of the EEC and the United States show a substantial increase in recent years, particularly for dried cassava roots. Today is is my dream to obtain $10,000.00 united state dollars to fund a factor that will produce jobs for more them 100 people living in the rural area of Liberia. For more Information you can sent us an e-mail compassion_lwa@yahoo.com

lenders.occupational_info: Advocating and organizing to create health and resilience in a 21st century food system.

lenders.name: Nila and Frank
lenders.loan_because: we want to help!
lenders.occupational_info: Frank is an actor and a writer. Nila is a musician in a band.

lenders.name: Debbie
lenders.loan_because: I want to help people in other countries have better food and nutrition, better education for their children, better medical care and more opportunities to protect and honor our Earth.
lenders.occupational_info: I work with volunteers to help people save energy and water in their homes and try to stop global climate change.

lenders.name: Ulf B.K.
lenders.loan_because: It's a sensible way to help people all around the world to long-term solutions for a better, surviving life and standard. With a bowl of rice you help for the moment, with a loan you help both for the moment and the future. It could make the difference.

lenders.name: Feizhen
lenders.loan_because: i want to help
lenders.occupational_info: to lead a happy life, just like you

lenders.name: Ian
lenders.loan_because: I have been both broke and hungry, before, and because it agrees with my understanding of Christ's will.
lenders.occupational_info: I taught swordfighting, and helped people with muscle problems become more healthy.

lenders.name: Michael
lenders.loan_because: I want to help people with startup businesses
lenders.occupational_info: we do web hosting for small companies, large companies, family sites, and blog and podcasters. Were your dedicated home on the web, and looking to help other companies get started up.

lenders.name: Con
lenders.occupational_info: Full time Collingwood Supporter and Liberal Party Member

lenders.name: Alan
lenders.loan_because:
1) "Poverty is a threat to peace" -  Muhammad Yunus.
2) Help from the developed worlds governments' has been... unskillful?
3) I'm Buddhist
4) It's a thrill doing something worthwhile, and with each repaid loan, I can do more good, again.

Suggested video:
- Food, Inc.

Suggested books: 
- There Is No Me Without You, One Woman's Odyssey to Rescue Africa's Children, Melissa Fay Greene
- For a Future to be Possible, Thich Nhat Hanh
- The Consumer's Guide to Effective Environmental Choices (Union of Concerned Scientists) Michael Brower, Ph.D. & Warren Leon, Ph.D.
- Banker to the Poor, Muhammad Yunus
- Blessed Unrest, How the Largest Movement in the World Came into Being   and Why No One Saw It Coming, Paul Hawken
- Giving: (how each of us can change the world), Bill Clinton
- The end of poverty: (economic possibilities for our time), Jeffrey D. Sachs
- Hot, flat, and crowded: (why we need a green revolution- and how it can   renew America), Thomas L. Friedman
lenders.occupational_info: I help set up and maintain computers and the computer network so my co-workers can help people and communities recover from all kinds of disasters

lenders.name: kerwin
lenders.loan_because: For my 7th birthday I asked my birthday guests to donate cash instead of a gift, so that I could lend through Kiva. We raised $95.00 . Everyone was interested and supportive.

lenders.name: Michelle
lenders.loan_because: There have been occasions in my life where a helping hand from someone made all the difference to me.  I wish to be a helping hand to someone else now.  It's my turn to pay it forward...
lenders.occupational_info: I am a former school teacher, now working to advocate for special needs and gifted students as well as consulting with schools and families on ed tech resources to meet the needs of all students.

lenders.name: Brittany :)
lenders.loan_because: I love all people.

lenders.name: Victoria
lenders.loan_because: Remember that children's story called Stone Soup?

lenders.name: Alison
lenders.loan_because: I love being part of change for the better and connecting with people around the world.  I think it's great to empower the human potential in every country and see the direct effect of their efforts and our support.

lenders.name: Elizabeth
lenders.loan_because: it makes me feel great!
lenders.occupational_info: I write proposals for my City's departments so they can get money for program and supplies from various government organizations and private foundations.

lenders.name: Steve
lenders.loan_because: I believe in empowering people to help themselves.
lenders.occupational_info: I work on making agricultural systems more sustainable and self-reliant.

lenders.name: Joseph Agins
lenders.loan_because: I want to help those in need and I see this as a fun way to do that.

lenders.name: Sue and Jay
lenders.loan_because: We believe that a hand up has more power and impact than a hand out.

lenders.name: John
lenders.loan_because: I can.

lenders.name: viri
lenders.loan_because: I want to help entrepreneurs break the cycle of generational poverty.
lenders.occupational_info: It's rumored that I live in museums.

lenders.name: Rob
lenders.loan_because: having started a small business from scratch, I know how important financial support is, and how challenging it can be to get.
lenders.occupational_info: Pets can play a very important role in peoples' lives- providing comfort and unconditional companionship. I like to think my work helps to enhance this bond by providing necessary medical help to keep pets healthy

lenders.name: Danielle
lenders.loan_because: I was the owner of a publication for 2 years. Due to economy, my business failed and now I want to help people so they are able to continue making their dreams come true.
lenders.occupational_info: I work for a California based Voice and Internet company providing high speed Internet connections and VoIP to businesses.

lenders.name: Joe  Columbus, Ohio
lenders.loan_because: I know what it is like to have a dream that I could reach if someone better off than I could loan me an amount that is large for me, but small for them.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a police officer in the U.S. in a major city. I spend my days driving a police car and not only arresting criminals, but helping citizens. I take pride in my work because I am able to use my critical thiking skills, my empathy for other's plights, and intellectual honesty to help others and not make them fear me as a police officer.

lenders.name: Therese Ericsson
lenders.loan_because: I believe it is a great way to empower people to create a better life for themselves and their families.

lenders.name: Danny
lenders.loan_because: Although my help seems insignificant, i feel proud and glad someone can earn a living with it. It is up to the entrepreneur to be successful through hardwork.

lenders.name: Matt
lenders.loan_because: I can
lenders.occupational_info: I work at a laboratory that assists in the radiation remediation process.  We work to remove hazardous and radioactive materials from the environment.

lenders.name: Mat
lenders.loan_because: It helps people who need help
lenders.occupational_info: Trying to make the UK Government better online

lenders.name: Emanuel
lenders.loan_because:
There is a good chance to use money for something good and meaningful.
Only if all of us have the possibility to prosper the global society can profit as a whole.
lenders.occupational_info: I work in the research area of computer sciences.

lenders.name: casin
lenders.occupational_info: Play online and win online your own money!

lenders.name: Marcin
lenders.loan_because: I want a way to help people directly.

lenders.name: hudepos
lenders.occupational_info: This site brings you a new vision of gambling, you'll have fun!

lenders.name: Eliza
lenders.loan_because: I want to help those less fortunate than me.

lenders.name: Paul & Kathy
lenders.loan_because: We like to help where we can, even if we can only do a little bit. If many people do several small things to help others, then we can help in big ways.

lenders.name: Gary and Elizabeth
lenders.loan_because: Because of what Jesus has done for me.  I'm grateful that Kiva gives each of us the opportunity to microlend and makes it so easy for regular folks like me and my family.  I love teaching my kids about it too.

lenders.name: Tricia
lenders.occupation: Record Executive (of my own small label)
